duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and coordinate work across the internationalization and localization portfolio to ensure positive relationships, input to solutions, and execution to meet goals.
Develop and mentor a team of Localization project, technical, and QA managers as well as linguists.
Lead the new locale International expansion strategy and oversee a localization management system using AI tools.
Monitor individual, team, and portfolio performance, and implement improvements to improve efficiency and effectiveness.
Set prioritization and escalation strategies to support localization excellence at scale.
Engage and build relationships with business partners across various departments.
Ensure linguists support the organization's international tone and voice across customer touch points and channels.
Select and manage translation/localization contractors, set quality and delivery standards, and approve invoices.
Guide product and development teams to ensure localization standard methodologies are followed and minimize downstream issues and decrease time-to-market for localized versions.
Evaluate existing workflows and technology solutions and develop and implement optimization KPIs.
Manage the localization budget and maintain relationships with vendors.
Define and build reporting frameworks and indicators to track and maintain a data-informed perspective.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Localization, Business, Linguistics, or equivalent experience (Master’s degree is a plus)
